title: Poka Poka Biyori
description: is a bonus CD sung by Ayumu Uehara, Ai Miyashita, Setsuna Yuki, and Lanzhu Zhong. The song is featured in Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club The Movie: Final Chapter Part 1 Blu-ray, which is included in the limited edition version of the Part 1 Blu-ray release. It was released on January 29, 2025.

infobox.Artist: Ayumu Uehara, Ai Miyashita, Setsuna Yuki, and Lanzhu Zhong
infobox.Label: Lantis
